going to meet an investment banker in san francisco.
heading to oakland to meet with a flash programmer for potential future collaboration.

heading up to capitol hill to meet with some congresspeople to discuss internet advertising.

serendipitous visit to the supreme court; planned to tour the building, but got into the chambers for 5 rulings. saw 8 of 9 SCOTUS justices!
arrived safely at the grand hyatt hotel... my favorite thing about it? plenty of power outlets and a comfortable aeron office chair
enjoying in-flight WiFi... can't wait until this is as ubiquitous as roasted peanuts and a refreshment.

exploring the new look, and new additions to google webmaster tools.
our cluster is back up, that was 30 minutes of theplanet downtime during peak hours.

lots of websites affected: http://bit.ly/5LphQ
 so much for redundant backbone connections.
ALL backbone connections to our data center at theplanet are down. every network graph is showning as falling off a cliff. unbelieveable!
our entire cluster of servers is down! theplanet's backbone connections down, can't even ping our servers.  their tech support line is busy.
google just announced that it will support microformats in upcoming search results with "rich snippets." need to add metadata to all pages.
safely back in nevada, although the storm in the sierras was pretty treacherous.
hellooo omaha!
en route to berkshire hathaway annual meeting in omaha. i get the sense that this is one of those things that is good to do at least once.
great to be back in the silver state.
